pages.text: The helm takes a $(item)$(l:modules/navigation/helm#maplike)map-like item$()$() and steers the boat towards the next waypoint on this item.

The $(underline)Edit path$() button opens the $(l:others/path_editor)Path Editor menu$(), to edit the waypoints represented by the item.$(br2)$(underline)Save on map$() is available only when you have a $(item)Map$() inside the helm. Clicking the button will convert the map to a $(l:modules/navigation/helm#map_with_path)Map with Path$() item, which stores the waypoint on the item directly.
